resources.string: Search, request and watch music videos based on your individual unique taste. Let the people in room contribute to a pre-existing queue of music videos
Inorder to get started using the Alma player we will need to get it connected to an internet source.
Please selected one of the options below:
Please make sure the ethernet cable is attached to the Alma box and an internet enabled router or modem.
Press \"OK\" to try to reconfigure your network settings again.
It seems your password id incorrect fot this wireless network, please try again.
You have successfully configured your internet network.
